entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening with 60 percent chance of flurries or freezing drizzle this evening and overnight. Fog patches developing early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries or freezing drizzle in the morning. Fog patches. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 3 in the morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Friday 21 April 2023
